title: There's no earthly reason for hybrids to get govt incentive: Tata Motors' P. B Balaji
description: The company is not considering bringing hybrid cars in the near future and will keep the "razor sharp focus on EVs" and double down efforts to drive its penetration, P.B Balaji, chief financial officer, Tata Motors group said in a post earnings media call.
